mapper.select:
select firstDict.* from t_first_dict firstDict where firstDict.DELETED_CODE = 0
and firstDict.FIRST_DICT_CODE like concat('%', #{firstDictDto.firstDictCode}, '%')
and firstDict.FIRST_DICT_NAME like concat('%', #{firstDictDto.firstDictName}, '%')
and firstDict.DICT_ID = #{firstDictDto.dictId}
order by firstDict.FIRST_DICT_CODE asc

select firstDict.* from t_first_dict firstDict left join t_dictionary dict on firstDict.DICT_ID = dict.DICT_ID where firstDict.DELETED_CODE = 0
and dict.DICT_CODE = #{firstDictDto.dictCode}

select firstDict.*,dict.dict_code from t_first_dict firstDict left join t_dictionary dict on firstDict.DICT_ID = dict.DICT_ID where firstDict.DELETED_CODE = 0 ORDER BY dict.dict_code desc,firstDict.FIRST_DICT_CODE asc
